message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me.  Given my understanding of the product's value, I'm willing to pay $1,300,000.  I believe this is a fair price that benefits both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your perspective. Considering the true value of this product, I can meet you halfway. I propose a price of $1,350,000. This reflects a fair compromise while acknowledging the significant benefits this product offers.
